original_text: The Lord also thundered in the heavens, and the Highest gave his voice; hail stones and coals of fire.
korean_text: 여호와께서 하늘에서 우렛소리를 내시고 지존하신 이가 음성을 내시며 우박과 숯불을 내리시도다

sentences.original_text: The Lord also thundered in the heavens
and the Highest gave his voice
hail stones and coals of fire
